audioText: Il est évident que cette solution technique résoudra tous nos problèmes de communication.
question: What is clear about the technical solution?
options: It might help with some issues
It will obviously solve all communication problems
It needs more testing before implementation
It's too complex for our current system
explanation: The text states 'Il est évident que cette solution technique résoudra tous nos problèmes de communication' - It is evident that this technical solution will solve all our communication problems. The adjective 'évident' (evident/obvious) expresses certainty.
